title: Claude Code INSIDERS: Codex FIRST Look and 5 AI Coding INSIGHTS
description:
Choosing ONE AI Coding tool is a mistake. OpenAI's new Codex, sits at the opposite end of the AI Coding Spectrum from Anthropic's Claude Code. 

Knowing the difference between the two is key to using as much compute as possible to ship your best engineering work.
